articles.title: 'Recycled' SpaceX capsule prepares to dock at International Space Station - The Irish News
articles.description: Frenchman Thomas Pesquet is the first European Space Agency (ESA) astronaut to blast off in the Crew Dragon spacecraft.
articles.content:

articles.title: Biden to make first overseas trip in office to UK, EU - Daily Mail
articles.description: Biden will attend the Group of Seven summit in Cornwall, England, set for June 11-13, followed by a visit to Brussels, where he will hold meetings with European Union leadership.
